How to Visit My Island Use DA code in the game: DA-3444-7211-0416
Island Overview ğŸ‘‰Partly Inspired, Partly Original: Images and DA code are for island building reference only and cannot be reposted or used commercially.
ğŸ‘‰Color Scheme & Style: Warm tones with a European/Western countryside feel, mixed with small areas of Japanese and forest themes.
ğŸ‘‰Design Guidelines: Use system tiles as much as possible. Avoid using simple wall panels for fake scenery.
ğŸ‘‰Connectivity: Most areas are connected; if you can’t find your way, try adjusting your perspective.
ğŸ‘‰House Interior: All interiors of the main house are complete and open for visiting. The hot spring inn is a small house; the first floor is mostly done, but the other two floors are not yet finished.
ğŸ¥³Finally, enjoy Your Visit!
